mapper.select:
SELECT ADM_NO, ADM_PROFILE , ADM_NAME,
CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ADM_BIRTHDAY <= 30 THEN 1 || '개월 미만' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), ADM_BIRTHDAY) < 12 THEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), ADM_BIRTHDAY)) || '개월' ELSE TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), ADM_BIRTHDAY) / 12 ) || '세'
END AGE,
ADM_PHONE, ADM_BIRTHDAY, ADM_BREED, ADM_GENDER, ADM_NEUTERING_YN, ADM_VACCINE_YN, ADM_SIGNIFICANT, ADM_APPLY_DATE, TO_CHAR(ADM_HOPE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADM_HOPE_DATE , ADM_YN, ADM_MEMBER_NO FROM ADMISSION ORDER BY ADM_APPLY_DATE DESC

SELECT ADM_NO, ADM_PROFILE , ADM_NAME,
CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ADM_BIRTHDAY <= 30 THEN 1 || '개월 미만' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), ADM_BIRTHDAY) < 12 THEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), ADM_BIRTHDAY)) || '개월' ELSE TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), ADM_BIRTHDAY) / 12 ) || '세'
END AGE,
ADM_PHONE, ADM_BIRTHDAY, ADM_BREED, ADM_GENDER, ADM_NEUTERING_YN, ADM_VACCINE_YN, ADM_SIGNIFICANT, ADM_APPLY_DATE, TO_CHAR(ADM_HOPE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADM_HOPE_DATE , ADM_YN, ADM_MEMBER_NO FROM ADMISSION WHERE ADM_NO = #{admNo} ORDER BY ADM_APPLY_DATE DESC
